document_data.name: Star of Melos-Pelar
document_data.creator: [[Martek]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Star of Melos-Pelar''' was one of five gems, the [[Star gem of Martek|Star Gems of Martek]] that the wizard [[Martek]] was said to have imbued with an enchantment to retrieve his Sphere of Power, but would actually resurrect him.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|4}}
document_data.Description: The Star of Melos-Pelar was a fist-sized, faceted [[amethyst]] of the deepest purple, either ball {{cite book/Desert of Desolation|107}} shaped.
document_data.Powers: The Star of Melos-Pelar had the power to point the way to [[Martek's Tomb]], if placed in the monolith in [[Medinat Muskawoon]].{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|95}}{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|96}}
document_data.History: The Star of Melos-Pelar was said to have disappeared into the Cursed City of Stone. Actually, Martek hid the Star of Melos-Pelar in the ruins of Medinat Muskawoon.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|5}}{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|95}} [[Adventurer]]s retrieved the Star of Melos-Pelar in {{yearlink|1356}}, using it to restore Martek to life.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|126}}
